constituent: association, thread, spiderman, shelf, my bookshelves
koohiiStory1: A common thread associates the knick-knacks on your knick-knack shelf. Souveneirs from Spain on one, from Japan on the other.
koohiiStory2: Watch this: http://i146.photobucket.com/albums/r249/sith_lord10/updated%20showroom%20july/s29.jpg The leader of the Spiderman association has tons of Spiderman figurines lined up on his shelf.(Zactacular).
